channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: North Carolina’s Dumb Bail Law
item.description: Laws such as this play into the hands of anti-enforcement progressives.

item.title: Changing face of America revealed by Census Bureau: White population dips to 56.3%, numbers of non-married grow
item.description: The United States became more demographically diverse from 2023 to 2024.

item.title: 9/11 responder's wife blasts Mamdani's link to Twitch streamer who said 'America deserved' attacks

item.title: Keir Starmer fires ‘Prince of Darkness’ Peter Mandelson, ambassador to U.S., over fresh revelations of Epstein links
item.description: On Wednesday, The Sun published emails that it said showed Mandelson telling Epstein to “fight for early release," adding "I think the world of you."

item.title: The Left Has Never Been Held Accountable For Political Violence — And That Must Change
item.description: Violence has long been weaved into the fabric of the American left, and until we honestly reckon with that, a bleak political future awaits.

item.title: Democrats Desperately Seek a Military Makeover
item.description: Their ‘security theater’ won’t change any voters’ minds.

item.title: Oracle’s blockbuster earnings swell Larry Ellison’s fortune by $100 billion in 30 minutes to put him neck and neck with Elon Musk
item.description: Only $1 billion separates the two richest men in the world after a wild day of trading.

item.title: Texas A&M fires English professor over children’s literature course that critics called ‘DEI and LGBTQ indoctrination’
item.description: The professor's lawyer said she had "taught this course and others like it for many years, successfully and without challenge.”

item.title: GOP congressman reveals how he learned about 9/11 terror attacks in remote Alaska wilderness
item.description: Montana Rep. Troy Downing shares how he found out about the September 11 attacks while hunting in Alaska and decided to join the military afterward.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Shows We Cannot ‘Come Together’ If We Cannot Even Coexist
item.description: I don’t know exactly what will happen next. I just know that it won’t be the same as what has happened in the past.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Feels Different Because It Marks The Start Of A New Culture War
item.description: Charlie Kirk’s assassination served as a true turning point. Democrats are in no way prepared for the fallout.

item.title: Social media trounces old media gatekeepers as news source for gory Charlie Kirk assassination video
item.description: Video was easy to find on X, TikTok, YouTube — even on Truth Social, where President Trump posted official word of the conservative activist's death.

item.title: The Growing Business of Government
item.description: Government is involving itself in ever more services. And we’re all paying for them.
